comment: Professor Sanseviro is the best! There are a lot of assignment, but they are very easy. Also, the groups projects are okay, if you have the right people. Very approachable and will respond within 12 hours. TAKE HIM!!!!! :D
Hes so funny! There are a lot of assignments, but all of the assignments are easy. He is an easy grader and super easy to talk to!

Def take him!! he is so funny and honestly gives you a reasonable amount of work. He gives you the inside scoop about ksu and he truly cares about his students. He doesn't take attendance after the first few weeks but I would recommend going atleast one a week so he remembers who you are and at the end of the semester he will bump you up.
Michael is a great teacher for the first year course. He always keeps you up to date with your assignments, which are mostly online.
GREAT teacher. Though the class was really easy and sometimes boring, he was a really interesting and entertaining guy, for sure!

Michael is great. He really knows what he's talking about and gives you behind the scenes information because he is a Dean. Also very funny- keeps class interesting. Tests are easy- some pop quizes though!Homework is not too common but easy. Overall it was nice to have a class that actually presented valuable information!! Great Professor :-)

Michael is extremely knowledgeable about KSU, and he's got connections/power, so in taking his class, you learn interesting things you wouldn't know elsewhere. He also has a pretty good sense of humor. Class was fun and interactive: a couple of group projects, a few easy quizes, an easy midterm & final, extra credit essay. I recommend Sanseviro.

LOVE this class! we get sooo off topic and he just lets us talk! he's open to questions and tells you everything about KSU which relle helps! he's soo much fun-kinda strict-but laidback at the same time...the hw he gives is simple and straightforward...
Sanseviro is a very smart man. He makes class very interesting but at times it can be boring, overall I would recommend taking him.
Great teacher! He's open & honest & extremely funny! As long as you do the work, you can easily get an A!
Really easy class, likes what he teaches. Boring, but endurable.
if you are cured in a learning community and have to take KSU 1101...pray to god this is your teacher. He is awesome and makes it fun. love this man
